questions.quote: That's all I needed to know. So you actually swim in this thing?
Hey What are you doing in my car? Hey!Hey!Hey! Where you going.
Well, I-I gotta call the Hospital. I gotta tell 'em what happened.
My name is George. I'm unemployed and I live with my parents.
Hey! I have spent a lot of time, and I have eaten a lot of crap to get to where I am today. And I am NOT throwing it all away now.
So, anyone sweaty comes into your house has to be offered a drink?
Hi, George. How ya feeling? Is anybody getting your apartment?
George, I've read this report. It's very troubling, very troubling indeed. It's a sick mind at work here.
Let's just say that I don't have to worry about working for a while. A long while.
...Yu uh, yes, yes uh, uh, Doctor Reston. Uhm well, hello there. Ahh yeah, well, I'm a good friend of Elaine's...
